EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® Shelf Life Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Shelf Life Statement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar®.
Attached is the document on Kevlar® shelf life.
For additional information, please refer to DuPont Kevlar® Technical Guide. Copy the following web address into your web browser. http://www2.dupont.com/Kevlar/en_US/assets/downloads/KEVLAR_Technical_Guide.pdf
DuPont Protection Solutions
